amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Naval Railgun for common mount development by $10,000,000, and decreases funding for the Strategic Capabilities Office by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to increase funding for the Naval Railgun for common mount development by $10,000,000, and decrease funding for the Strategic Capabilities Office by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 355 - 73 (Roll no. 342).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 355 - 73 (Roll no. 342).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A094) offered by Mr. Langevin.
